name: Group Achievements For WordPress
tagline: Encourage collaboration on your BuddyPress site with Group Achievements
body:
# Group Achievements for BuddyPress
Group Achievements for BuddyPress is a plugin to enable your [Achievements][] plugin
to have achievements at the group level.

For example, you may want to only give members their achievement karma when all
members of their group have unlocked the achievement.

## Requirements
* [Achievements](http://wordpress.org/plugins/achievements/)
* WordPress 3.5 or newer

## Installation
* Download and install the [Achievements](http://wordpress.org/plugins/achievements/) plugin from the WordPress.org repository.
* Install this plugin

## Contributing
We'd love to have patches for this plugin, so feel free to send pull requests via the GitHub site, and we'll take a look at them as soon as possible!

## Credits

part of client work for [Sennza](http://www.sennza.com.au/). Thanks also to [Human Made](http://hmn.md/) for their excellent [Custom Meta Boxes](https://github.com/humanmade/Custom-Meta-Boxes) library.
